pr_title: More prominent instructions on code coverage failure

timeline.message: More prominent instructions on code coverage failure

timeline.bodyText: nit: "For more instructions on how to run code coverage locally, follow instructions.." reads sort of funny, maybe one of the 'instructions' should be replaced with 'details' or some other word?
timeline.author: clintropolis
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -183,7 +183,7 @@ jobs:
           --log-template "totals-complete"
           --log-template "errors"
           --
-          || { printf "
Diff code coverage check failed. To view coverage report, run 'mvn clean test jacoco:report' and open 'target/site/jacoco/index.html'
" && false; }
+          || { printf "

****FAILED****
Diff code coverage check failed. To view coverage report, run 'mvn clean test jacoco:report' and open 'target/site/jacoco/index.html'
For more instructions on how to run code coverage locally, follow instructions here - https://github.com/apache/druid/blob/master/dev/code-review/code-coverage.md#running-code-coverage-locally

" && false; }
